entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming east 20 this morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow and local blowing snow beginning near midnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
